name: Casa Amarilla
description:
My entry for the crappy games jam #crappyjam

It has no point, playing this game is really just a waste of your time. (But it was fun to make ;) ). This is my first "game" in unity, so this was really just the result of me messing around and testing out different things.

I have versions of this game for windows, mac, and linux, but I'm not very familiar with mac or linux so I'm not sure if those versions will work correctly since I couldn't test them out. The windows version works just fine. Sorry if the others don't work :)
